The local economy may not be able to support the influx of tourists, leading to increased prices and a strain on local businesses.
The local culture and way of life may be negatively impacted by the influx of tourists, leading to a loss of authenticity and cultural integrity.
The increased demand for accommodations and services may lead to a shortage of available options, causing tourists to feel frustrated and unsatisfied.
The influx of tourists may lead to increased environmental impact, such as pollution and noise pollution, which can harm the local ecosystem.
The influx of tourists may lead to increased crime rates, as opportunistic criminals may see the influx of visitors as a target.
